刚买，非常好玩，出乎我的意料，不过玩过一个小时后我得歇歇，因为有点晕（
Класс,мне нрав ,не зря копил со школьных обедов

옛 추억을 떠올리며 "그땐 이렇게 했었는데.,., 어떡하더라.." 생각이 짜증이 아니라 다시 한번 더 생각 해주는 갓겜..
스토리도 늘 새롭고 신박함.. 애초에 포탈 이란 컨셉 자체가 재미가 없을 수 없지 ㅋㅋ

This game is a lot of fun to play, the workshop contains thousands of user-made levels, making virtually infinite gameplay. The campaign is nice and long, and if you want to play with a friend, you can play split-screen by plugging in another keyboard+mouse or a controller, and it also has online co-op! This game you can just play forever!

Recomendadicimo. El mejor juego de su genero con un monton de referencias al half life. su historia es inmersiva y no te aburres nunca conforme avanzas  la complejidad de los niveles aumenta haciendolo dinamico y dandole una sensacion de dificultad. tiene muy pocos o casi ningun bug y el multijugador esta mur bien logrado.
Это самая классная головоломка от первого лица. Игра не надоедает из-за того что постояно подкидывают разные механики.

Despues de haber pasado ambos juegos, crei que seguiria la historia pero se corto un poco rapido a mi gusto, aunque algunos niveles me dejaron literalmente bloqueado y me sacaron de quicio :) Valve se lucio con los ambientes en el juego, sobre todo en portal 2: la caida, el ambiente logrado en esos niveles fue increible y las incognitas de la trama te mantienen en el juego todo el tiempo buscado easter eggs o caminos alternativos, sobre todo las menciones a black mesa en ciertas partes del juego te hace poner la piel de gallina solo pensar en la relacion de el mundo de Portal con Half Life. Totalmente recomendado.

Залез я в данную игру под гашишем(был раскумареный)
Игра пушка 
Но в одного играть не очень 
Накур лучший
Кура 17 из 17
Портал моя любимая и советую играть

12/10 This game improves on the first in every regard. it has great puzzles, atmosphere, characters, and story. It also feels a bit lengthier than the first game and is more story driven. I'd reccomend to anyone.

The only thing that I disliked about the game was the low level of actual challenge. It feels like pacifist Metroid, and I always looked forward to GLaDOS's next line. If you like games that have an amazing story and realistic difficulty level, this one will leave you going to the community chambers long after you've finished the game.
o único jogo em que eu adoro ficar ouvindo o vilão falando sem parar
this game smells like dog water an not the good kinds like hotdog water
Un juego realmente hermoso y cautivador. Me que do sin palabras.
This game is very fun and it has awesome graphics! I recommend it to people who like adventure games and puzzle solving games because it is mainly that.
I am a terrible person. thanks glados!
do not play this game for as long as i have played this game under any circumstance

Portal is a fun game, Very complex but very fun. Portal 2 was my first ever source game. (Excluding HL2 and CS:GO) I was a person who loved puzzles so I really enjoyed Portal. Portal is a great game, not simple but very good if you want a brain teaser for 10 hours

Gameplay: 10/10
Graphics: 9/10
Simplicity: 3/10
Fun: 8/10
Overall: 9/10
Totally worth your money, it never ages either. Its a good game to fall back on or just play continuously for a few hours. Plenty of fun and challenging in a good way.
Excelente juego para pensar y con buena historia. Lo recomiendo

Dle mého lepší jednička, je to funny zabaví, hlavně co-op mod.

8/10
I know Valve don't do number 3, so they could do Portal 4, or 2.5, I would totally play it!
This takes the aspect of puzzle games, and packs it full of insane and unimaginable feats that no other puzzle game could comprehend. DEFINATELY would recommend. 10/10.
Just give it a try, i know that for a fact that anybody who plays this game like it

Вторая часть вышла очень красивой, и в конечные камеры и локации мне кажутся проще. Советую пройти даже если не играли в первую!
if you havent beaten the singleplayer 984257 times then you arent a tru gamer

incredible game, deep story, perfect gameplay, made me really think and got me to seet for strait 5 hours so i could finish the game. if you didn't played this game, you didn't played a good game in your life. 10/10.

This is a wonderful puzzle game with brilliant story, writing and character development. it's a musthave for any PC owner and if you like even more puzzles then you can play in Coop or do the community chambers. the replay-ability is awesome.

Me pondría a hablar sobre el juego, pero creo que sale más a cuenta decir que es uno de los mejores juegos del mundo...

Nota final:

Re Contra Piola (10/10)
Gra fajna, krótka, luźna, tania, na jeden wieczór.
iyi oyun partnerimle birlikte çok iyi bir oyun olacağını düşündüğüm için satın aldım
Harika Tek Kişide olsan 2 kişide olsan sıkılmadan oynayabileceğin bir oyun tavsiye ediyorum

Всем привет! Моё первое знакомство с Portal было ещё в далёком детстве, и уже тогда, благодаря этой игре, я умел решать не столь сложные, но и не лёгкие задачи на логику.
К чему всё это предисловие? А к тому, что это не просто игра, а целая серия головоломок, которые решит даже не каждый взрослый! Эта игра будет давить на вас, особенно ГлаДОС, которая всячески хочет ранить ваше внутреннее состояние различным стёбом. Это даже не обидно, а больше забавно.
В процессе игры мы встречаем как и головоломки, так и действия на скорость, такие как побег и другие. Игра вам точно не даст заскучать.
Я всем рекомендую поиграть и пройти эту замечательную игру. Если ты не проиграешь в неё, то можно сказать, что ты упустил шанс, который возможно будет невозвратным. А так игра хорошая, рекомендую!

神奇……第一個關卡竟然是我覺得最難的，但第一關也是關鍵，幫助玩家瞭解這個游戲的基本機制。通關了會很有成就感。感覺跟塞爾達的神廟很像。儅沒有時間玩塞爾達的時候就玩這個來練練手。
P.S.好喜歡那個圓溜溜的跟屁蟲，屁話很多又很活潑的樣子，可愛~
It's Portal frickin' 2... what else needs to be said?
Este juego es genial, cada puzzle está muy bien diseñado, y a pesar de ser algo difíciles, jamás te llegas a desesperar. Tiene una historia increíble, y varios giros en la trama.

I wonder if theres gonna be portal 3... I mean this game is so beautiful!! I trought  that i portal is not for me, but  I just couldn't stop playing! Everyday on spare time i just needed to see whats next. 11 hours of playing singleplayer. I didn't regret this tho. Sadly playing second time won't be as satysfying as the first time.. And playing multiplayer etc. won't feel the same. You know that i almost started to cry when i knew the fabular ends here?.. I mean hell i never felt this in other games. I know i am over-dramatic now but AAAGHH. I know that if there will be portal 3 it will need to end anyways, but it would just feel better if end of the game would be more sure...To end? [spoiler]  I mean we are finally free [/spoiler], but you know how much can happend anyways? I don't know if you understand me (because my english is still pretty bad) but i just feel like our journey isn't done yet.
amazing game would reccomend to play portal then portal 2 but still its an amazing game
Игра офигенная,советую всем кто любит головоломки.

Amazing, one of my favorite games of all time. Improves on the original in every way. 

10/10
Muito bom o cooperativo em tela dividida, ficaria perfeito com mais fases complexas ja que isso é a cara do jogo
Sla, Portal 2 é muito bom, não tem como não gostar
This is one of the best game i have played ever it has great humor and the game play makes your brain fell like cooked eggs sometimes but when it clicks it clicks (btw in not a review bot so ya)
